content.text:
[@dominic](@EMovhfIrFk4NihAKnRNhrfRaqIhBv1Wj8pTxJNgvCCY=.ed25519) 

I've been trying to read up on the various observable implementations in JavaScript and noticed that you main both [obv](https://github.com/dominictarr/obv) and [observable](https://github.com/dominictarr/observable). They seem to do similar things, but they have a different API.

If you have time, could you help me understand the difference between the two and/or when they should be used?
